forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Drizzle then Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle before 4am, then a chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. South wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Veterans Day
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely before 4pm, then a slight chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the night drapes its cool fabric over Downtown San Francisco, the city is cloaked in a soft haze, with the potential for a gently falling drizzle before dawn. The cloudy sky speaks of an impending rain, a fitting backdrop for a Saturday evening when the warmth of home might beckon. The air carries a crisp chill, nudging the temperatures toward the mid-fifties. Early risers tomorrow will encounter a landscape where thick clouds hang low, with the likelihood of rain intensifying as the day unfolds; one can almost sense the shadows of fog curling around familiar landmarks, whispering of oceanic promises just beyond view.

Veterans Day promises to be a mix of overcast gray clouds and the occasional teasing glint of sunlight. The breeze, slightly stronger this time, suggests a brisk walk might be invigorating, yet one should don layers to fend off the creeping chill. A light raincoat or sweater will serve well against the dampness that may punctuate afternoon activities. While outdoor excursions might be a tad dampened, the allure of cozy cafes or quiet bookstores can transform this rainy day into a soothing retreat. Gather with friends over warm drinks or lose oneself in the pages of a good book as the soft patter of rain accompanies the day, creating a gentle symphony that only the heart of San Francisco can provide.
